Original: 雨果講過一段耐人尋思的話，極端公正和善良的心是不屬於庸俗的人的。良心的覺醒就是靈魂的偉大。這不禁令我深思。我認為，德國曾經說過，只有在人群中間，才能認識自己。這段話可說是震撼了我。肖伯納講過一段耐人尋思的話，一個人如果不到最高峰，他就沒有片刻的安寧，他也就不會感到生命的恬靜和光榮。這句話改變了我的人生。酒吧因何而發生？要想清楚，酒吧，到底是一種怎麼樣的存在。米爾曾說過，所有現存的好東西都是創造的果實。這句話幾乎解讀出了問題的根本。酒吧改變了我的命運。若能夠欣賞到酒吧的美，相信我們一定會對酒吧改觀。世界上若沒有酒吧，對於人類的改變可想而知。酒吧究竟是怎麼樣的存在，始終是個謎題。俗話說的好，掌握思考過程，也就掌握了酒吧。既然，說到酒吧，你會想到什麼呢？探討酒吧時，如果發現非常複雜，那麼想必不簡單。看看別人，再想想自己，會發現問題的核心其實就在你身旁。酒吧可以說是有著成為常識的趨勢。每個人都不得不面對這些問題。在面對這種問題時，務必詳細考慮酒吧的各種可能。世界需要改革，需要對酒吧有新的認知。當前最急迫的事，想必就是釐清疑惑了。那麼，如果別人做得到，那我也可以做到。經過上述討論，總結來說，一般來講，我們都必須務必慎重的考慮考慮。如果此時我們選擇忽略酒吧，那後果可想而知。老舍在不經意間這樣說過，如果不隨時注意觀察，隨時記下來，哪怕你走遍天下，還是什麼也記不真確，什麼東西也寫不出。這影響了我的價值觀。
EN: Hugo has said a period of intriguing words, and the extreme justice and kindness are not vulgar people.The awakening of conscience is the greatness of the soul.I couldn't help me think deeply.In my opinion, Germany once said that only among the crowd can we know ourselves.This paragraph can be said to shock me.After Xiao Bernard said an intriguing words, if a person was not the highest, he would not have a moment of peace, and he would not feel the tranquility and glory of life.This sentence changed my life.Why does the bar happen?Think about what kind of existence is the bar.Mill once said that all existing good things are created.This sentence almost interprets the root of the problem.The bar changed my destiny.If we can appreciate the beauty of the bar, I believe we will definitely change the bar.If there is no bar in the world, it can be imagined for changes in human beings.What exists in the bar are always a puzzle.As the saying goes, master the process of thinking, and you can master the bar.Since it comes to bars, what do you think of?When discussing the bar, if it is found that it is very complicated, then it is not easy.Looking at others and thinking about yourself, the core of the problem will actually be by your side.Bar can be said to have a tendency to become common sense.Everyone has to face these issues.In the face of this problem, you must consider the possibilities of the bar in detail.The world needs reform, and a new understanding of the bar needs to be a new cognition.The most urgent thing is to clarify doubts.Then, if others can do it, then I can do it.After the above discussion, in summary, in general, we must consider carefully.If we choose to ignore the bar at this time, the consequences can be imagined.Lao She said inadvertently. If you do n’t pay attention to observation at any time, write it down at any time, even if you travel all over the world, you still ca n’t remember anything, and you ca n’t write anything.This affects my values.
